data.name: BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light - Additional Map - Atelier Ryza Collab Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
As the girls recall memories, they encounter a certain alchemist...

Adds a new Heartscape and its map, as well as a corresponding event.

■Story
One day, the Heartscape of someone unknown to Ao and the girls suddenly appears before them.
Nervous, yet curious, the girls venture inside, only to discover the scattered memories of a certain female alchemist.
By exploring her memories, just what can Ao and the girls gain...?

Note: The added event does not include any voice-overs.
Note: To enjoy using the content, you must advance the game to a certain extent.
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This content is part of the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass". In addition, the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition", which includes the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass", is also available. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

data.short_description: As the girls recall memories, they encounter a certain alchemist... Adds a new Heartscape and its map, as well as a corresponding event.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 or over, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or over, AMD Radeon RX560 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 pixel over display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 or over, AMD Ryzen 3 3100 or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1070 or over, AMD Radeon RX 5600XT(PCI-express4.0) or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 pixel over display recommended. For environments using AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT, we recommend using PCI-express 4.0.
